author: JuanCarVen
title: #19 Anne Hathaway entregará un premio a Pedro Sánchez la próxima semana en Nueva York
text:
[RTZ](/user/RTZ)a [cadenaser.com](/go/link/3981302) [#2](c2#c-2) Sabrán que empobrece por igual a mujeres y hombres.
España se convierte por primera vez en el país del euro con mayor riesgo de pobreza [#13](c13#c-13) Y qué prefieres, si por ahora nadie ha articulado una alternativa viable?
Vivimos rodeados de mentes vacías de espíritu crítico y llenas de odio. Bastante que todavía no tenemos un gobierno PP-VOX con mayoría absoluta.
El mal menor es mucho menor que el mal mayor.
[#2](c2#c-2) Esos premios se compran, Milei ha comprado el suyo, Aznar también se compró uno, coño Obama se compró un Nobel de la paz.
https://elpais.com/diario/2004/07/23/portada/1090533602_850215.html
https://www.bbc.com/mundo/noticias-internacional-38586508
https://www.newtral.es/milei-premio-juan-de-mariana/20240521/
[#2](c2#c-2) me gusta por que es cierto, al final ha permitido una igualdad real, hasta su mujer ha podido usar Moncloa para el tráfico de influencias patrio que el heteropatriarcado nos tiene habitualmente en portada
Teniendo en cuenta que esta semana Feijóo ha ido a Italia a hacerse fotos con Meloni.... la verdad es que se me ocurren muchos chistes....
[#10](c10#c-10) Para cagarse en dios son abogados marranos, manos sucias, hazte orín, la iglesia católica y sus pederastas, toda la derchusma patria, la fortuna del vaticano, todas las putas religiones de mierda...
Pero esto? Esto es para echar unas risas y un chupito.

author: @perripolson
title: Thunderstorms spark bushfires in Wheatbelt regions
text:
Yesterday's thunderstorms created the perfect conditions for bushfire activity in what was already a hot, dry and windy day.
A west coast trough formed on January 1, which developed into a dry thunderstorm over the Wheatbelt and Great Southern regions yesterday.
Hot temperatures in the low 40 degrees Celsius caused much of the rainfall to evaporate before it reached the gauges and many towns recorded 10 milimetres or less.
Beverley recorded 24mm of rainfall yesterday, while Narrogin Aero received 22mm, and Wagin Aero picked up 15mm.
The trough is currently sitting over the Goldfields and Esperance regions, and will continue to move east, easing fire conditions.
Another west coast trough is expected to form early next week, bringing an increased chance of a thunderstorm by Monday or Tuesday afternoon.
Shire of Wongan-Ballidu chief bushfire control officer, Ross Lane, said brigades responded to three bushfires on Wednesday evening at east Kondut, north east of Wongan Hills and at Manmanning.
The fires were burning through paddocks of stubble and, Mr Lane said they were relatively easy to manage with fire breaks.
"The biggest one was about 160-170 hectares, we've had a fair bit bigger than that (in the past)," Mr Lane said.
"It cleaned up pretty well and there wasn't much bush involved."
Humidity and cloud cover made the job a lot easier to take care of, and eventually the wind dropped off.
"It's like chalk and cheese, if you've got 12 per cent humidity or 25pc," he said.
"I don't complain when there's humidity."
On the same day, volunteers from Beverley responded to two incidents on private properties, one involving a vehicle.
About 40 hectares were burnt at each property, with little property damage.
"We managed to save one house that was very close," Shire of Beverley chief bushfire control officer, Bill Cleland said
One of the fires was near a pine plantation, which took longer to control.
"The first fire got 15-18mm of rainfall on it, but the second fire was probably seven kilometres west of that and got none," Mr Cleland said.
"The rain probably helped with making the first one safe and preventing other lightning strike fires."
Mr Cleland said the level of community support was phenomenal, with more than 40 volunteers showing up to assist in controlling the fire and the clean up.
"It was a full day yesterday (of clean up), it's a big community effort when we have these sorts of events."

author: deccanchronicle.com
title: Apple to Launch Truecaller-like Caller ID For Businesses Next Year
text:
Apple to Launch Truecaller-like Caller ID For Businesses Next Year Technology DC Web Desk 17 Oct 2024 10:55 AM GMT x Apple to Launch Truecaller-like Caller ID For Businesses Next Year. (Photo: Apple) Apple is set to bring a caller ID feature for business next year, called the Business Caller ID.
This feature will let the businesses display their names and logo on the call screen of the customers they are trying to connect. In a blog post, Apple wrote, "Next year, businesses will also be able to register for Business Caller ID. Their name, logo, and department appear on the inbound call screen when they contact customers, helping to distinguish verified businesses from spam callers and other unwanted outreach." “We designed Business Connect to empower businesses to present the best, most accurate information to Apple users. With today’s updates, we’re helping even more businesses reach customers, build trust, and grow,” said David Dorn, Apple’s senior director of Internet Software and Services Product.
Businesses with a physical location or without a physical location as well as who operate online can register for this feature.
Businesses can display their brand in the Mail and Phone apps. "With Branded Mail, businesses can display their brand name and logo in emails to customers, so their emails stand out in the Mail app and are more easily recognisable," read the Blog. ( Source : Deccan Chronicle )
